doc:
Caroline McWilliams https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Caroline_McWilliams 0 Caroline Margaret McWilliams (April 4, 1945 – February 11, 2010) was an American actress best known for her portrayal of Marcy Hill in the television series Benson. McWilliams had also appeared in nine episodes of its parent-series Soap, as Sally. She was a regular on the CBS soap Guiding Light (as Janet Norris) for several years and appeared in a short-term role (as Tracy DeWitt) on the NBC soap Another World. She also had a recurring role on Beverly Hills, 90210 playing the mother of Jamie Walters' character, Ray Pruit. Caroline_Margaret_McWilliams ( April_4_,_1945 – February_11_,_2010 ) was an_American_actress best_known for her_portrayal of Marcy_Hill in the_television_series_Benson . McWilliams had_also_appeared in nine_episodes of its_parent-series_Soap , as Sally . She was a_regular on the_CBS_soap Guiding Light_( as Janet_Norris_) for several_years and appeared in a_short-term_role ( as Tracy_DeWitt_) on the_NBC soap Another_World . She also had a_recurring_role on Beverly_Hills , 90210 playing the_mother of Jamie_Walters '_character , Ray_Pruit .
